code: import React from"react";import{OptionPanel}from"./styles";import accessories from"@/components/CharacterOptions/accessories";import OptionStyleSelectable from"@/components/Selectables/option-style-selectable";import toArray from"lodash-es/toArray";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{setAccessory}from"@/redux/character/character.actions";var AccessoriesPanel=function AccessoriesPanel(){var dispatch=useDispatch();var _useSelector=useSelector(function(store){return store.character;}),selectedAccessories=_useSelector.accessories;var accessoryOptions=toArray(accessories).map(function(_ref){var name=_ref.name,thumb=_ref.thumb;return{value:name,thumb:thumb};});return React.createElement(OptionPanel,{id:"accessories-panel","aria-labelledby":"accessories",className:"accessory-options"},React.createElement(OptionStyleSelectable,{title:"Accessories",styles:accessoryOptions,onResetClicked:function onResetClicked(){return dispatch(setAccessory(undefined));},onStyleClicked:function onStyleClicked(style){return dispatch(setAccessory(style));},selectedStyle:selectedAccessories,className:"accessories"}));};export default AccessoriesPanel;
